mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.productno = p.productno JOIN users u ON r.userno = u.userno WHERE p.productno=1 AND r.productno=1
select * from (select rownum as rnum, tmp.* FROM (select * from review order by reviewdate desc) tmp) WHERE rnum >= #{startNum} AND rnum <= #{endNum}
SELECT count(1) FROM review WHERE productno=1
select i.*, u.id from inquiry i, users u where productno = ${_parameter} and u.userno = i.userno order by inquirydate desc
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (inquiryNo, userNo, productNo, inquiryTitle, inquiryDetails, inquiryDate) values ('i'|| inquiry_seq .nextval, #{userNo},#{productNo}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryDetails},SYSDATE)
